#id=1
#text=Earth day happens every year on April 22 .
#id=2
#text=I decided to do something about it later year and went out to plant a tree this year .
#id=3
#text=I wondered over to a local tree farm , and bought a sapling with a friend .
#id=4
#text=We both borrowed a friend 's pick up truck and drove to a place in the woods that we usually hang out at .
#id=5
#text=While we arrived there , it was beautiful weather for the beginning of Spring .
#id=6
#text=We went off to the area where we always set up our tents when we go camping .
#id=7
#text=We ended up digging near the campsite and removed the bag around the sapling .
#id=8
#text=Carefully , we both picked up the tree and placed it in the hole we dug and it fit in perfectly !
#id=9
#text=After that I carefully held the tree in place while my friend filled the hole back with dirt .
#text=A year later , the tree is still growing in perfect health .
